executable.title: ZScoreMapping
executable.description: This is a CLI module that performs the voxel-wise Z-Score map calculation give an input image and template images for mean and std. A mask can be used in order to define a region of interest. If a mask is not defined, the calculation will be performed in every voxel that contains a value bigger than zero in the reference template.
